text:
@CNNSotu @GavinNewsom Nope. The feds should share the costs directly attributed to the treatment of those infected with the Coronavirus -nothing else. Governor Newsom owns the cost of ordering the state shut down and all preexisting conditions.
#MAGA #Trump2020 #Trump2024 #Repeal22A
